about_the_game:
Innovative stereophonic sound technology, now in everyone's hands

Advanced stereophonic sound technology, which was once considered difficult, can now be easily experienced by anyone. The “Motorcycle Sound Simulator” is a completely new approach to simulation that makes it easy for anyone to understand and utilize complex sound technology.

The “Motorcycle Sound Simulator” uses Yamaha Corporation's Sound xR™ stereophonic technology.

“This application uses Sound xR™ spatial audio processing engine for earphones and headphones, i.e. Binauralizer from Yamaha Corporation.”

Democratizing Technology - Anyone, Anywhere, Easily

Complex technology into a simple experience

No specialized knowledge required

No special equipment required

Experience professional-grade stereophonic sound with just one pair of headphones

Innovative tool for learning and practicing at the same time

Not just for game developers, but for anyone interested in sound

Practical sound experience, not theory

Intuitive sound movement and spatial expression

Everyone can be a sound creator

This simulator is the very “gateway” tool to democratize advanced acoustic technology. Without complicated technical knowledge or expensive equipment, you can experience the fascination of stereophonic sound and apply it to your own projects.

Include the explanatory text “This is using Sound xR,” (explaining that it is stereophonic sound).

New possibilities of sound for everyone

Stereophonic sound is no longer just for a few experts. The Bike Ride Simulator Sound xR is an innovative tool that democratizes sound technology and makes it easily accessible to everyone.

Unleash your creativity with sound!

Translated with (free version)

name: BikeRide IMMERSIV AUDIO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: これまで難しいとされてきた高度な立体音響技術が、今、誰もが簡単に体験できる時代に。『バイクサウンド シミュレーター』は、複雑な音響技術を誰もが手軽に理解し、活用できるようにした、まったく新しいアプローチのシミュレーターです。
